critique: This document is a withdrawal of public lands in Nevada from settlement, location, sale, entry and all forms of appropriation, pending a resurvey of said township. It cites the act of June 25, 1910 (36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (37 Stat. 497), and subject to the conditions, provisions and limitations of said acts, and the act of March 3, 1909 (35 Stat. 845). There is nothing to suggest any ideological tilt, immigration approach, stance on executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, all scores should be 0.
